live_updates: Technicians continue to work to restore service as quickly possible. However, due to the nature and location of the repairs involved, this will take several more hours.  Current ETR is 10:00pm, but we will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available.  Thank you for your patience.
Due to the complexity of this outage, our technicians are still working to resolve.
Due to the complexity and location of this outage, we are not able to reach it in the dark. Work on resolving this issue will continue tomorrow.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
32545.summary: Some customers in Scotch Creek are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
32545.title: Jan 26 – Scotch Creek | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
